resources.string: This scene is completed Darling.\n\n Please go back to the map or buy exciting things from the store

Wow! You are brilliant. Game completed 
 
 
 Wait till we upload new scenarios

This app was built through a Syster\'s initiative, to improve the physical and mental health trends of pre-adoloescents all over the world. PowerUp teaches social, emotional learning, conflict resolution, and health skills in a fun, interactive way. Through the game, the player\'s decision making skills and trends while in critical situations are judged and alloted points. Super powers can be unleashed to make the player stronger as the game proceeds.
